icon.description: A hosted image URL of the Advertiser Brand Icon

description.description: A description of the Advertiser and their related services or propositions.

external_link.description: A URL that Partners can visit to learn more about the Advertiser.

twitter.description: A Twitter URL that Partners can visit to learn more and get updates from the Advertiser.

subscription_fee_usd.description: Monthly subscription fee in USD for the advertiser to use the platform.

affiliate_royalty_rate.description: Royalty rate (percentage) on affiliate payouts, paid by the advertiser.
